title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 135 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 135 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the name of the LORD; praise him, O ye servants of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 你们要赞美耶和华。你们要赞美耶和华的名。

lineList.en: Ye that stand in the house of the LORD, in the courts of the house of our God,
lineList.cn: 耶和华的仆人站在耶和华殿中，站在我们神殿院中的，你们要赞美他。

lineList.en: Praise the LORD; for the LORD is good: sing praises unto his name; for it is pleasant.
lineList.cn: 你们要赞美耶和华。耶和华本为善。要歌颂他的名，因为这是美好的。

lineList.en: For the LORD hath chosen Jacob unto himself, and Israel for his peculiar treasure.
lineList.cn: 耶和华拣选雅各归自己，拣选以色列特作自己的子民。

lineList.en: For I know that the LORD is great, and that our Lord is above all gods.
lineList.cn: 原来我知道耶和华为大，也知道我们的主超乎万神之上。

lineList.en: Whatsoever the LORD pleased, that did he in heaven, and in earth, in the seas, and all deep places.
lineList.cn: 耶和华在天上，在地下，在海中，在一切的深处，都随自己的意旨而行。

lineList.en: He causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries.
lineList.cn: 他使云雾从地极上腾，造电随雨而闪，从府库中带出风来。

lineList.en: Who smote the firstborn of Egypt, both of man and beast.
lineList.cn: 他将埃及头生的，连人带牲畜都击杀了。

lineList.en: Who sent tokens and wonders into the midst of thee, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.
lineList.cn: 埃及阿，他施行神迹奇事，在你当中，在法老和他一切臣仆身上。

lineList.en: Who smote great nations, and slew mighty kings;
lineList.cn: 他击杀许多的民，又杀戮大能的王，

lineList.en: Sihon king of the Amorites, and Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan:
lineList.cn: 就是亚摩利王西宏，和巴珊王噩，并迦南一切的国王，

lineList.en: And gave their land for an heritage, an heritage unto Israel his people.
lineList.cn: 将他们的地，赏赐他的百姓以色列为业。

lineList.en: Thy name, O LORD, endureth for ever; and thy memorial, O LORD, throughout all generations.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你的名存到永远。耶和华阿，你可记念的名存到万代。

lineList.en: For the LORD will judge his people, and he will repent himself concerning his servants.
lineList.cn: 耶和华要为他的百姓伸冤，为他的仆人后悔。

lineList.en: The idols of the heathen are silver and gold, the work of men's hands.
lineList.cn: 外邦的偶像是金的，银的，是人手所造的。

lineList.en: They have mouths, but they speak not; eyes have they, but they see not;
lineList.cn: 有口却不能言，有眼却不能看，

lineList.en: They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there any breath in their mouths.
lineList.cn: 有耳却不能听，口中也没有气息。

lineList.en: They that make them are like unto them: so is every one that trusteth in them.
lineList.cn: 造他的要和他一样，凡靠他的也要如此。

lineList.en: Bless the LORD, O house of Israel: bless the LORD, O house of Aaron:
lineList.cn: 以色列家阿，你们要称颂耶和华。亚伦家阿，你们要称颂耶和华。

lineList.en: Bless the LORD, O house of Levi: ye that fear the LORD, bless the LORD.
lineList.cn: 利未家阿，你们要称颂耶和华。你们敬畏耶和华的，要称颂耶和华。

lineList.en: Blessed be the LORD out of Zion, which dwelleth at Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
lineList.cn: 住在耶路撒冷的耶和华，该从锡安受称颂。你们要赞美耶和华。
